meaning: wheel, ring, circle, link, loop, counter for wheels and flowers

onyomiExamples.meaning: contour, outline, border, silhouette, summary, outline, sketch, looks, features, appearance
keirin, cycle racing event, usu. 2km with a paced start and sprint finish

kunyomiExamples.meaning: ring, circle, loop, hoop, wheel, circle (e.g. of friends)
cutting in round slices, round slice, dividing into groups (e.g. by ability)
haniwa, hollow unglazed terracotta figure from the Kofun period
